newsitem.title: USA: IMM currency futures keep edging to downside.
newsitem.headline: IMM currency futures keep edging to downside.

text.p: April 14 - IMM currency futures slowly drifted lower, near day's lows. Turnover stayed very subdued, with brokers saying even yen pit had little life. Some said June marks could test contract low at $0.5815 but that likely would occur on scanty volume which could exaggerate moves. Waiting for Tuesday's March US CPI, some focusing on G7 meeting April 26 weekend.
